title: [K-12] Organizational Learning Strategies Utilizing Tacit Knowledge: An Interdisciplinary Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic organizational learning theory and understanding of mathematical modeling
context.additional_context: Exploring strategies to apply organizational learning of tacit knowledge through math-based case analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four dimensions of tacit knowledge: physical, emotional, intuitive, and spiritual.
Learners can mathematically represent organizational learning models using a multidisciplinary approach (neuroscientific/evolutionary biological frameworks).
Learners can apply the three-stage process of tacit knowledge surfacing-internalization-sharing to real-world cases.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
